SqlClientMetaDataCollectionNames.summary: Provides a list of constants for use with the method to retrieve metadata collections.

Columns.summary: A constant for use with the method that represents the Columns collection.

Databases.summary: A constant for use with the method that represents the Databases collection.

ForeignKeys.summary: A constant for use with the method that represents the ForeignKeys collection.

IndexColumns.summary: A constant for use with the method that represents the IndexColumns collection.

Indexes.summary: A constant for use with the method that represents the Indexes collection.

ProcedureParameters.summary: A constant for use with the method that represents the ProcedureParameters collection.

Procedures.summary: A constant for use with the method that represents the Procedures collection.

Tables.summary: A constant for use with the method that represents the Tables collection.

UserDefinedTypes.summary: A constant for use with the method that represents the UserDefinedTypes collection.

Users.summary: A constant for use with the method that represents the Users collection.

ViewColumns.summary: A constant for use with the method that represents the ViewColumns collection.

Views.summary: A constant for use with the method that represents the Views collection.

AllColumns.summary: A constant for use with the method that represents the AllColumns collection.

ColumnSetColumns.summary: A constant for use with the method that represents the ColumnSetColumns collection.

StructuredTypeMembers.summary: A constant for use with the method that represents the StructuredTypeMembers collection.
